a1-pureflow-rouv.name: A1 PureFlow RO + UV
a1-pureflow-rouv.description: 7-stage purification with copper infusion and smart tank monitoring.
a1-pureflow-rouv.recommendation: Ideal for hard water and apartment usage.

a1-aquashield-ro.name: A1 AquaShield RO
a1-aquashield-ro.description: Compact 6-stage RO with quick filter replacement design.

a1-mineral-plus.name: A1 Mineral+ Cartridge
a1-mineral-plus.description: Enhances taste and restores essential minerals.
a1-mineral-plus.recommendation: Recommended with RO systems for better taste.

a1-sediment-guard.name: A1 Sediment Guard
a1-sediment-guard.description: High-capacity pre-filter for dusty and borewell areas.
a1-sediment-guard.recommendation: Essential for homes with sandy water.

a1-servicecare-annual.name: A1 ServiceCare Annual
a1-servicecare-annual.description: Quarterly checkups and priority support for a full year.
a1-servicecare-annual.recommendation: Best value for ongoing purifier health.

a1-commercial-ro-50.name: A1 Commercial RO 50L
a1-commercial-ro-50.description: High output system designed for cafes and offices.

a1-uv-compact.name: A1 UV Compact
a1-uv-compact.description: UV + UF system for low TDS municipal water.

a1-smart-dispenser.name: A1 Smart Water Dispenser
a1-smart-dispenser.description: Hot + ambient dispensing with child-safe design.

a1-copper-guard-pro.name: A1 Copper Guard Pro
a1-copper-guard-pro.description: 8-stage smart purifier with live TDS display and copper enrichment.
a1-copper-guard-pro.recommendation: Best for families needing advanced monitoring and long life.

a1-ro-membrane-kit.name: A1 RO Membrane Kit
a1-ro-membrane-kit.description: High-rejection membrane replacement kit for consistent purification.
a1-ro-membrane-kit.recommendation: Recommended every 9-12 months depending on source water.
